Text: RE American Airlines ISDAContact for the ISDA with AA is Geraldine Lim The address PO Box Mail Drop DFW Airport TX Express Delivery Amon Carter Blvd MNail Drop Ft Worth TX Phone Fax Sounds great Thanks for the update while we are on credit watch at least we can get these type of items taken care of Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Monday October AM To Friedman Richard Subject FW American Airlines ISDA Richard As you can see below I just replied to Mark instead of forwarding to you Credit is not throwing you off They did send a revised worksheet I have turned around comments and they have been reviewed by a lawyer I have completed finalizing the comments but since AA sent their agreement in pdf which cannot be edited I have had to turn around a hard copy of our comments Can you give me a physical address where I can overnight our comments Thanks Marie Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Monday October AM To Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE American Airlines ISDA Richard Credit is not throwing you off They did send a revised worksheet I turned around comments and they have been reviewed by a lawyer I am working on finalizing our comments to send back to AA today Marie Original Message From Taylor Mark E Legal Sent Monday October AM To Heard Marie Subject FW American Airlines ISDA Marie can you please check on this and let Richard know where we stand Thanks Original Message From Friedman Richard Sent Friday October PM To Taylor Mark E Legal Subject American Airlines ISDA According to credit the AA ISDA worksheet was sent back to legal last week Have you seen it or are they throwing me off Rich Friedman Enron Global Markets LLC
OUC ISDA StatusHave you heard anything back from credit on the questiuon of the Credit Support Annex Thank you Rich Friedman Enron Global Markets LLC

RE Orlando Utilities Commission Cc Since we havent been able to get the ISDA they have yet to trade with us this will hopefully let us compete for the business so any trading is better than before Thanks for the attention Sara let me know what to do next wait for you to finish the new draft Original Message From Johnson Rudwell Sent Monday October AM To Shackleton Sara Friedman Richard Cc Rohauer Tanya Subject Orlando Utilities Commission Sara We are ok with eliminating the CSA from the ISDA with Orlando Utilities Commission OUC However we would like to add an additional termination event of debt rating change below A for OUC and BBB for Enron Corp Richard In the absence of any margin rights we will be monitoring trading activities with this counterparty more closely and this may result in certain transactions limitations Rudwell
Orlando ISDAHave you received the credit update from Rudwell Johnson Is this close to being ready to send back out to them Rich Friedman Enron Global Markets LLC
American Air ISDAAny news on where this may stand now Rich Friedman Enron Global Markets LLC
American Airlines ISDAAccording to credit the AA ISDA worksheet was sent back to legal last week Have you seen it or are they throwing me off Rich Friedman Enron Global Markets LLC
